rpc.schema
Class Attribute

java.lang.Object
  rpc.schema.Attribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Attribute>
public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Attribute>

Attribute class holds information about an attribute of a schema item.

Field Summary
 java.lang.String name
          The name of the attribute.
 
Constructor Summary
Attribute(java.lang.String name, SchemaItem baseItem)
          Construct an attribute object by setting its name and its source schema item.

Method Detail

isCategorical

public boolean isCategorical()
Checks whether or not the attribute is categorical and should not be discretized.

Returns:
true if set to categorical; false otherwise.

compareTo

public int compareTo(Attribute other)
Compares this attribute with another attribute. The two are the same if and only if they have the same name.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Attribute>
Parameters:
other - the other attribute to compare against.
Returns:
the comparison between the two attributes' names.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Compares this attribute to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the attributes have the same name and the same base schema item.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - the object to compare this attribute against.
Returns:
true if the attributes are equal; false otherwise.

public int hashCode()
Returns a hash code for this attribute. The hash code is equal to the hash code of its string representation.
